welcome: Welcome! Send me a link from Instagram, TikTok, or YouTube to download content.
invalidUrl: Please send a valid link from Instagram, TikTok, or YouTube.
unsupportedUrl: This link is not supported. Please send a link from Instagram, TikTok, or YouTube.
error: Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
subscribeRequest: You have reached the download limit. Please subscribe to the channel {channelLink} to continue using the bot.
